text: Widzew Łódź is a Polish football (soccer) club from Łódź, Poland. The club was started in 1910 and currently plays in the Ekstraklasa (the highest league in Poland). They have won the Polish league four times (1981, 1982, 1996 and 1997). Their official colours are red-white-red. title: Widzew Łódź
